Title: Includes fuel-flexible linear generators which do not utilize a fossil fuel resource in the process of generating electricity as qualifying as renewable energy systems
Summary: Includes fuel-flexible linear generators which do not utilize a fossil fuel resource in the process of generating electricity as qualifying as renewable energy systems.
LawCode: Amd ยง66-p, Pub Serv L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the public service law, in relation to the definition of renewable energy systems
